Articles.Content:
On the 5th of August 2012 PST, The Curiosity Rover touched down on the surface of Mars, Equipped with the best Scientific Equipment ever sent to the Red planet. To Celebrate this occasion the folks at the SAM (Sample Analysis at Mars) Labs played a Special song using the vibrations of the Equipment to the Rover. Happy Birthday from Earth!

Disclaimer! I Didn't Make this Video, All rights to this video Belong to NASA!
Get a move on to Mt Sharp! They remind me of my family driving the minivan across the country and stopping at every single fruit stand along the way.
